message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. This is a great deal, considering its value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $9000. This is a compromise that still reflects the value of the product to me, while also showing that I'm willing to negotiate.
